description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3.  A Tower Defence game, The rainbow sheep are launching an invasion.Use your skills to defend the castle from this onslaught. Beware the Rainbow sheep army will try thier best to get by our defences stop them at any cost.There are optional game modes such as "Quick play" and "Endurance" Test your abilities
